content: from * to ** once double_crochet in last 2 double_crochet join with slip_stitch in first double_crochet finish off color d 92 sts and 4 chain-1 sps round 4 join color b with slip_stitch in second double_crochet of prev round chain 2 double_crochet in same double_crochet as join *3 treble_crochet in next double_crochet decrease see special stitches hdc2tog see special stitches double_crochet in next st 3 treble_crochet in next st double_crochet in next st half_double_crochet in next st single_crochet in next st half_double_crochet in next st 3 times** double_crochet in next double_crochet repeat from * 2 more times repeat from * to ** once join with slip_stitch in first double_crochet finish off color b 120 sts round 5 join color c with single_crochet in second treble_crochet of prev round 2 single_crochet in same treble_crochet *single_crochet in each of next 5 sts 3 single_crochet in next treble_crochet single_crochet in next 2 sts sc3tog see special stitches single_crochet in next 2 sts 3 times** 3 single_crochet in next treble_crochet repeat from * 2 more times repeat from * to ** once join with slip_stitch in first single_crochet finish off color c 128 sts round 6 join color a with single_crochet in second single_crochet of prev round *half_double_crochet in next single_crochet double_crochet in next single_crochet double_crochet treble_crochet in next single_crochet 2 treble_crochet in next single_crochet treble_crochet double_crochet in next single_crochet double_crochet in next single_crochet half_double_crochet in next single_crochet single_crochet in next single_crochet half_double_crochet in next single_crochet double_crochet in next single_crochet tr3tog see special stitches double_crochet in next single_crochet half_double_crochet in next single_crochet 3 times** single_crochet in next single_crochet repeat from * 2 more times repeat from * to ** once join with slip_stitch in first single_crochet finish off color a 116 sts round 7 join color d with single_crochet in first single_crochet of prev round single_crochet in next 4 sts 2 single_crochet in next treble_crochet chain 2 2 single_crochet in next treble_crochet *single_crochet in next 27 sts 2 single_crochet in next treble_crochet chain 2 2 single_crochet in next treble_crochet repeat from * 2 more times single_crochet in next 22 sts join with slip_stitch in first single_crochet finish off color d and weave in all ends 128 sts note if your block is not quite 12 you can add additional rounds of single_crochet or replace round 7 with half_double_crochet or double_crochet around adding a couple additional stitches at each corner find moogly s blog post about the pinwheel square here and everything you need to know about the moogly2019cal here go back and find the previous three squares and check back at moogly every week for a new square design from a new designer i cannot wait to see what colors you have chosen have fun
